tool_description: Establishes tracking systems and metrics for monitoring cleaning schedule adherence, efficiency, and effectiveness over time.

tracking_metrics.description: Metrics to track (completion_rate, time_accuracy, quality_score, consistency)

reporting_frequency.description: How often to generate reports (daily, weekly, monthly)

error_messages: Invalid schedule_id: Schedule does not exist
Invalid tracking_metrics: Must include at least one of [completion_rate, time_accuracy, quality_score, consistency]
Invalid reporting_frequency: Must be one of [daily, weekly, monthly]
usage: Set up tracking systems to monitor how well your cleaning schedule is working and identify areas for improvement.
